isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - CAB ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - OWNER/OPERATOR SPARE SWITCH

svcsubproc.title: With Fuse
svcsubproc.para: This option provides switched battery power on circuit 14AQ for owner/operator connections. Power from the (B2) battery stud is applied, through 30A fuse F10-A, to the spare accessory relay (167) common terminal. With the key switch in the on or accessory position the relay is energized applying the power to the spare accessory switch (517). When switch 517 is turned on, power is applied to circuit 14AQ.

svcsubproc.title: Without Fuse
svcsubproc.para: This option provides switched battery power on circuit 14AQ for owner/operator connections directly through the spare accessory switch (517).
